name: Seagrave Holmes
affiliation: Eulogy Jones(formerly)Rivet City SupplyRivet City Council(optional)
role: Owner of Rivet City SupplySlaver (formerly)Council member (optional)

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: You'd better get out of here. The guards are going to close up soon.

topics.topic: MS03RCHistory1Could I ask you about Rivet City's history?
topics.topic_text: What do you know about Rivet City's history?
topics.response_text: Oh, I really wouldn't know. I mean, long as I can remember, she's just been here, soaking up all the repairs and attention we can give her.

topics.topic_text: Well, what can you tell me about the reconstruction?
topics.response_text: Oh, well, the old girl had seen a lot of damage, especially where the Mirelurks used to nest, and where the Super Mutants kept trying to get in.

topics.topic_text: Can you think of anyone from back then that might know more?
topics.response_text: Last feller I remember from back then was Mr. Pinkerton, and he must've left about a decade ago, after that spat with the science team.

topics.topic_text: Vera spoke very highly of you. She says you know all about this place.
topics.response_text: She did? Well, I suppose I have picked up a lot over the years. I mean, no one's spent more time tinkering on this old girl than I have!

topics.topic: MS03RCHistory3ASetting the record straight is exactly my goal.
topics.topic_text: Enough about Rivet City.
topics.response_text: Oh, right. I sort of lose track of time talking about the old girl.

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about an android from the Commonwealth?
topics.response_text: I reckon you're talking facial surgery and memory reprogramming.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the android from the Commonwealth?
topics.response_text: Some dang fool was selling android recordings. I was just as big a fool for buying one.{doubting the rumors}

topics.topic_text: You know anything about the mind wipe on that escaped android?
topics.response_text: Shhh! They might be listening.

topics.topic_text: Got any info on an android mind wipe? Here's a 100 cap "research fee."
topics.response_text: Shhh! They might be listening.

topics.topic_text: You know how they rewrote engrams in a cluster of Android memory subroutines?
topics.response_text: Shhh! They might be listening.

topics.topic_text: Do you know who did the memory transfer on the escaped android?
topics.response_text: Yep. Old Pinkerton. They say he helped found Rivet City. Must be some sort of crazy genius.{bragging that he is in the know}

topics.topic_text: I'll give you 100 caps if you know who did the mind wipe on that android.
topics.response_text: Yep. Old Pinkerton. They say he helped found Rivet City. Must be some sort of crazy genius.{bragging that he is in the know}

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about the AI swap on that Commonwealth android?
topics.response_text: Yep. Old Pinkerton. They say he helped found Rivet City. Must be some sort of crazy genius.{bragging that he is in the know}

topics.topic_text: Where can I find Ted Strayer?
topics.response_text: Have you tried the common room?  That's where he sleeps.

topics.topic_text: Anything? Chems? Guns? How about parts and junk?
topics.response_text: Yep. I'll take it all. One man's junk is another man's treasure.

topics.topic_text: Bannon tells me you're trying to steal his Council seat.
topics.response_text: Steal it? Hardly. He runs the council like it's his own personal bank account.

topics.topic_text: Just what the Wasteland needs, another junk vendor...
topics.response_text: Suit yourself. Sooner or later everyone has stuff to unload that only I will take.

topics.topic_text: How do I know you won't rip me off?
topics.response_text: You don't. No guarantees in the Wasteland. No rebates or exchanges either.

topics.topic_text: You got a T-51b? No? Then you don't have everything.
topics.response_text: A what?

topics.topic_text: Thank God! I can barely carry all this stuff.
topics.response_text: Well, I'm not open just now, but I will be by daybreak. Stop by.

topics.topic: RCTopicGetDrinksWhere can I get a stiff drink?
topics.topic_text: Do you know where I can get something to drink?
topics.response_text: The Weatherly Hotel is a good choice. It's on the upper deck.

topics.topic_text: Did you know that Paulie Cantelli is an addict?
topics.response_text: He's totally strung out. It's going to kill him one of these days.

topics.topic_text: When are Angela and Diego getting married?
topics.response_text: Angela and Diego. It's about time, don't you think?{First sentence is wistful}

topics.topic: RivetCityBarterI'm here to do business with you.
topics.topic_text: What have you got to sell?
topics.response_text: After what you did? Only because I have to.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: I think most of the people from back then have either moved on or passed away, sorry to say.

conversation.response_text: Hello, Vera. I just got in a new hot plate. I can sell it to you at a discount.
Ha, ha! Nothing you'd be interested in. Only good stuff.{Comeback response to a joke.}
Closing time. I hope Vera waits for me.
Vera! Wonderful to see you. You look lovely today.

description:
Seagrave Holmes is a 30 year-old Caucasian Male.

Seagrave Holmes is a 30-year-old human male who serves as the proprietor of Rivet City Supply in the year 2277. A skilled tinkerer with a knack for fixing anything, Seagrave has become a well-respected figure in Rivet City despite his controversial past. Known for his friendly demeanor and willingness to help others, he has recently announced his candidacy for a seat on the Rivet City Council.

Seagrave Holmes's Personality: Seagrave is a brilliant tinkerer who doesn't boast about his abilities. He's approachable and gets along well with common folk, focusing on practical solutions rather than political or historical matters. Despite his shady past, he presents himself as a trustworthy and helpful member of the Rivet City community. He's also known for his persistence in matters of the heart, particularly in his pursuit of Vera.

Seagrave Holmes's Backstory: Born around 2247, Seagrave Holmes once had business ties with the slavers at Paradise Falls, working as a partner to Eulogy Jones. However, he eventually broke away from that life and established himself in Rivet City. Despite Eulogy's repeated attempts to bring the slave trade to Rivet City, Seagrave has consistently refused. In Rivet City, he founded Rivet City Supply, a general store that stocks 'a little bit of everything.' Over the years, he has helped his fellow merchants and residents with various technical problems, even creating secure storage units for those in need. His past has remained largely hidden from the public eye, though some, like Bannon, suspect there's more to his story.
